reply_to.body_tagged: hey opnion tomi

replies.body: the fact that ive been mapdev and builder and retired by itself is i believe enough of a warning plus i have talked to them about this countless times, we had to work by ourselves (the people who actually tried like me ryan spooks etc) and we got no appreciation, why should i put time and effort into a server that doesnt even care about your creation. they take absolutely no care like making xml etc, well that was my decision and i will not be bringing back any of my already made maps, sorry

replies.body:
probably hasnt changed since last ama

if we are talking general ocn/avi skill:

ches (experienced and very good at what he does)
Loo (same than ches)
Lg (very well rounded, good at almost everything)
ryan (really experienced and really good at what he does)
brick (same than delta but prob better at sword and at bow(??))
delta (could have more understanding of the gameplay and bow skill, very good at sword)
zegita (all round player, probably is slightly worse now bc inactivity)
okiba (even tho hes very good at sword, he could do better if he had more experience)
me (i can play almost any position)
steyn (inactive, idk how good he is rn)
nemo (very good defender, kinda needs more experience which would make him even better)
tazz (good offender, inactive)
robo (idk where to place him bc he got worse bc of inactivity, used to be one of ocn best canoneers tho)
bmb (used to be better bc inactivity)
pope (inactive, used to be better)

u or ches

idk, depends on what content. for mc it would be pretty much no one

replies.body: Based on ocn who are the best players on my team
replies.body_tagged: Based on ocn who are the best players on my team

replies.body:
Como persona no te conozco demasiado pero me caes bien, por lo que vi sos de esas personas que no le hacen mal a nadie. 

Como jugador la verdad creo que en un cierto momento la chiteaste, aunque ahora sos legit y me parece que mejoraste muchisimo en comparacion a antes de cuando creo que la chiteabas.

Me parece que tienen muy buenos jugadores, y llevan un año como team casi (creo). La verdad que los veo muy bien para el torneo que viene.

No tiene sentido que haya habido un mapa de TDM de tiebreaker, yo ya me veia venir que iba a haber un empate y me dijeron que iban a contar monumentos lanas y touches, y pasó lo que pasó. Por lo menos no va a pasar de nuevo sin que me demoteen ahora xdxd
replies.body_tagged:

Hace mucho que no hablamos, pero siempre me caíste bien, como jugador mejoraste constantemente. Creo que algunas actitudes tuyas te imposibilitaron haber estado en equipos aún mejores en ocn en su momento, o eso recuerdo escuchar. 

Cada uno tiene su cosa, no me quedo con ninguno.

No, mucho trabajo para jugar una vez por semana. Cuando se disbandee PPB simplemente hare un lft.
